title: Bivalent COVID-19 Vaccine Scheduling
description: COVID-19 bivalent vaccines have been authorized by the FDA and recommended by the CDC in an effort to keep people safe against COVID-19.

Schedule Your Updated Vaccine Online Today If you have not had your Bivalent COVID-19 Vaccine, click below to schedule your vaccine or call [513 86 COVID](tel:5138626843) ( [513 862 6843](tel:5138626843)). Please bring your vaccine card from your first vaccine series to your booster appointment. You can also schedule a booster shot at one of the many [Greater Cincinnati community locations](https://gettheshot.coronavirus.ohio.gov/).
